drivers.name: cdj550
drivers.comments: This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

notes:
Multifunction Printer/Scanner
Have not explored scanner functionality under Linux; almost certain no to work.
Works quite well as a 300x300 dpi color printer.
Printer Doc's claim 600x600 on special paper, but 300x300 on normalpaper looks good.

Consumables/Refills: Indv. Ink Refills per color
